title: Wave pulse set - wave speed in setups X Y Z

content.description: The three setups, setups <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>, <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>, use strings with the mass per length and horizontal length values given in the table. The setups have identical blocks hanging from their respective strings.
content.question: SetupMass per Lengthof String <math alttext="In kilograms per meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mtext>kg/m</mtext></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>Horizontal Lengthof String <math alttext="In meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math><math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math><math alttext="1.0 times 10 raised to the negative 3 power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math><math alttext="1.00" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.00</mn></math><math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math><math alttext="1.0 times 10 raised to the negative 3 power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math><math alttext="0.50" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.50</mn></math><math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math><math alttext="2.0 times 10 raised to the negative 3 power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math><math alttext="1.00" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.00</mn></math>Which of the following correctly ranks the speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> of the wave pulses generated in the three setups?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub X, equals v sub Y, which equals v sub Z, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>X</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Y</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Z</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub X, equals v sub Y, close parenthesis, which is greater than v sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>X</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Y</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Z</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="v sub X is greater than open parenthesis, v sub Y, which equals v sub Z, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>X</mi></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Y</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Z</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="v sub Y, is greater than v sub X, which is greater than v sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Y</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>X</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Z</mi></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub X, equals v sub Y, close parenthesis, which is greater than v sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>X</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Y</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>Z</mi></msub></math>

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
